task.title: Deploying a WCF application to a Windows DEA cluster

context.p: Windows applications running in Windows DEA clusters on Helion OpenStack or Helion Public Cloud are not limited to Web Applications and Web Sites. This tutorial demonstrates how to deploy a WCF application.
This tutorial will demonstrate how to deploy the WCF Getting Started sample application to a Windows DEA cluster running on Helion Public Cloud.

ul.li: A Helion OpenStack Public Cloud account wih a Windows DEA cluster.
The WCF Getting Started sample application. This sample can be found here.

Any edition of Visual Studio 2013, including the Community (free) edition, with the following packages installed:
Cloud Foundry MSBuild Tasks version 1.2.0.3
Cloud Foundry Extensions for Visual Studio
